column2: An editing error meant a crucial figure was omitted from a sentence in an opinion piece (How can Rees-Mogg find ‘opportunities’ that don’t exist?, 12 February, Journal, p3). It intended to say that Wales would be deprived of “close to £1bn” over the next three years because the UK government had broken its manifesto promise to plug the gap previously filled by EU funds.
